Pre-Game Insights: New Orleans Pelicans (3-5, 14th in the Western Conference) will face Cleveland Cavaliers (8-0, first in the Eastern Conference) in a non-conference matchup on November 7, 2024.
The Pelicans had a 49-33 overall record with a 21-19 home record during the 2023-24 season.
The Cavaliers had a 48-34 overall record, 31-21 in Eastern Conference play, and 22-19 on the road last season.
Key injuries for the Pelicans include Trey Murphy III (hamstring), CJ McCollum (adductor), Herbert Jones (shoulder), Dejounte Murray (hand), and Zion Williamson (hamstring).
Key injuries for the Cavaliers include Dean Wade (illness), Caris LeVert (knee), Emoni Bates (knee), Max Strus (ankle), and Jaylon Tyson (hip).
